title: Leaked Credentials from Internal System
description: A credentials dump has been leaked from an internal system, potentially due to a phishing campaign targeting employees. The leak includes user credentials from internal.corp and sample.org, and affects the primary authentication server and related databases.

affected_systems.name: Primary Authentication Server
affected_systems.impact: Potential unauthorized access and data exfiltration

affected_systems.name: Related Databases
affected_systems.impact: Potential unauthorized access and data exfiltration

mitigations: Immediate password rotation for all affected users
Monitor network traffic for unusual activity
Check logs for access patterns related to leaked credentials
